body:
we all know why i left but now that legoche has retired from modding im willing to make a fresh start both with him and anyone else who i annoyed with my retirement pipe bomb message
i am open to a fresh start with legoche and i apologise for all the horrid comments and their were a lot that i said about him only conditon for legoche is he apologises for the 2 stupid tempbans he gave me the team griefing and the ban evasion one then i'll forgive him and bury all animosity towards him 

lego I'm sorry for my comments about you they were wrong and said in the heat of the moment cos of how mad i was at your bans cos they were inaccurate if you could pls find it within your heart to apologise for them i'll admit i was in the wrong to slag you off on the forums the way i did and i'll no longer mention this on forums or in chat and that aside from the 2 bans you were in the right and trying to do a hard job.

I'm sorry lego and too anyone else i annoyed on here now pls lets make a fresh start

the Ko Kid
Kojo

replies.body:
To be fair I temp banned you once and the other temp ban a Senior requested a ban on you...
Anyway, apology accepted.

Just don't go making a hate thread on anybody else...
replies.body_tagged:
To be fair I temp banned you once and the other temp ban a Senior requested a ban on you...
Anyway, apology accepted.

Just don't go making a hate thread on anybody else...

replies.body: thats ok but why would a senior request a temp ban on me for ban evasion when 5thteen is actually my bro you would have to watch 5thteen and kojo play and notice we play really differently so its easy to tell when im using 5thteen or vice versa. but i've never actually griefed from a team either
replies.body_tagged: thats ok but why would a senior request a temp ban on me for ban evasion when 5thteen is actually my bro you would have to watch 5thteen and kojo play and notice we play really differently so its easy to tell when im using 5thteen or vice versa. but i've never actually griefed from a team either

replies.body:
Seniors are the only ones who can IP check. Since you and your brother play off the same IP and your brother was banned at the time, they thought that it was one person and not two brothers and it looked like you were ban evading.

Also, I am not replying to your next comment, I don't wanna start a flame war.
